attributes.action: ensure before he starts reforming our democracy that we are allowed to vote in a referendum on his proposals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I shudder to think what will happen to our democracy if the Government because of it's difficulties are allowed to reform it - to their liking!

It should be the people of the country and not just the political elite that should have a say in any reforms.
